user: hi! can you find shih tzus within 50 miles of 92602
bot:
I looked up Shih Tzus available for adoption within 50 miles of 92602. I have found:

- **Sparky**, a senior male Shih Tzu and Poodle (Standard) mix, located in Lake Forest, CA. He is a small dog (25 lbs/11 kg or less). Here's a link to a photo: https://pet-uploads-staging.adoptapet.com/3/5/a/348704708.jpg.
- **Peanut**, a senior male Shih Tzu, located in Anaheim, CA. Here's a link to a photo: https://pet-uploads-staging.adoptapet.com/c/b/0/429647628.jpg.
- **Woody**, a senior male Shih Tzu, located in Montclair, CA. He is a small dog (25 lbs/11 kg or less). Here's a link to a photo: https://pet-uploads-staging.adoptapet.com/f/4/3/473686116.jpg.
- **Big Spot & Troubles**, a puppy female Shih Tzu and Mixed Breed (Small) mix, located in Rosemead, CA. She is a small dog (25 lbs/11 kg or less). Here's a link to a photo: https://pet-uploads-staging.adoptapet.com/2/2/3/457486302.jpg.
- **Herbie**, an adult male Shih Tzu, located in San Bernardino, CA. He is a small dog (25 lbs/11 kg or less). Here's a link to a photo: https://pet-uploads-staging.adoptapet.com/3/6/e/457706915.jpg.
- **MALTY**, a senior male Shih Tzu and Maltese mix, located in Pasadena, CA. He is a small dog (25 lbs/11 kg or less). Here's a link to a photo: https://images-staging.adoptapet.com/images/no-dog-large.gif.
- **Bubbles**, a senior female Shih Tzu, located in Inglewood, CA. She is a small dog (25 lbs/11 kg or less). Here's a link to a photo: https://pet-uploads-staging.adoptapet.com/5/c/d/450585428.jpg.
- **Nikki is delightful**, a young female Shih Tzu and Poodle (Standard) mix, located in Redondo Beach, CA. She
